heading: HR02107
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ISSUE OF NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY'S IMPORTATION OF 330,000 BAGS OF RICE INFESTED WITH RICE WEEVIL ("BUKBOK") THAT LANDED ON THE SUBIC BAY FREEPORT AND TABACO CITY PORT, ALBAY, ITS DELAYED DISTRIBUTION AND SUPPLEMENTARY OPERATION OF FUMIGATION
